body:

Command-line tools version: 10.1.0.0.1.1539992718
Apple LLVM version 10.0.0 (clang-1000.10.44.4)
Target: x86_64-apple-darwin17.7.0

Steps to reproduce:
```
./autogen.sh
./configure --without-gui
make -j2
```

title: Mac OSX High Sierra 10.13.6 Build error
